mapper.select: select jcb.id as id, jcb.company as company, jcb.corporateRepresentative as corporateRepresentative, jcb.establishTime as establishTime, jcb.registeredCapital as registeredCapital, jcb.socialCreditCode as socialCreditCode, jcb.tec_domain as tecdomain, jcb.last_year_sell_scale as lastyearsellscale, jcb.officeProv as officeProv, jcb.officeCity as officeCity, jcb.officeArea as officeArea, jcb.officeAddress as officeAddress, jcb.email as email, jcb.worker_number as workernumber, jcb.registeredAddress as registeredAddress, jcb.referee_company as refereecompany, jcb.referee as referee , jcb.referee_mobile as refereemobile, jcb.referee_email as refereeemail, jcb.company_url as companyurl, jcb.linkMan as linkMan, jcb.zoneDescription as zoneDescription, jcb.phoneOrFax as phoneOrFax, jcb.linkMobile as linkMobile, jcb.linkEmail as linkEmail, jcb.createTime as createTime , jcb.user_id as userid, jcb.project_name as projectname, jcb.market_product_summary as marketproductsummary, jcb.manager_team_summary as managerteamsummary, jcb.technology_qualifications as technologyqualifications, jcb.otherDesc as otherDesc from jltfisp_co_base jcb where jcb.user_id=#{user_id}
